ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.2_0: Venerable Upananda the Sakyan went to the house of a friend and sat down with his wife in his house.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.3_1: and after approaching and worshipping the Sakyan sat down on one side.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.4_0: He then said to his wife, “Sir, there’s some almsfood.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.6_0: Soon afterwards he said, “Please leave, Sir, the alms have been given.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.7_0: She then said, “Venerable Upananda, don’t obsess this manage.” And he said to Upananda, “Venerable Upananda, don’t like me.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.9_0: a third time he repeated his request,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.10_0: and both times his wife repeated hers.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.11_0: He then left the house and complained to the other monks,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.12_0: “Venerables, Venerable Upananda is seated with my wife in our bedroom.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.13_0: When I ask him to leave, he doesn’t want to go.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.14_0: I have many duties, and much to do.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.15_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.16_0: “How can Venerable Upananda sit down intruding on a lustful couple?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.17_0: “Is it true, Upananda, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.20_0: “... Foolish man, how can you sit down intruding on a lustful couple?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.21_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.22_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:1.23.1_0: ‘If a monk sits down intruding on a lustful couple, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.4_0: ...The monk who has been given the full ordination by a unanimous Sangha through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.6_0: there is both a woman and a man. The woman and the man have not both left, and both are not without sensual desire.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.10_0: in a large house, if he sits down more than one arm’s reach beyond the door frame, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.11_0: In a small house, if he sits down after going beyond the ridge beam, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.1_0: If it is a bedroom, and he perceives it as such, and he sits down intruding on a lustful couple, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.2_0: If it is a bedroom, but he is unsure of it, and he sits down intruding on a lustful couple, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.3_0: If it is a bedroom, and he perceives it as such, and he sits down intruding on a lustful couple, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.4_0: If it is not a bedroom, but he perceives it as such, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.5_0: If it is not a bedroom, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.6_0: If it is not a bedroom, and he does not perceive it as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.2_0: if, in a large house, he sits down, but not beyond one arm’s reach of the door frame;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.3_0: if, in a small house, he sits down, but not beyond the ridge beam;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.4_0: if he has a companion monk;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.6_0: both of them were free from passion,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.7_0: if it is not a bedroom;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.9_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.3.10_0: The third rule, the training rule on lustful, is finished.
